DOC.HEADLINE: O.C. RELIGION NOTES / DAYE CLARK : CHURCH TO CELEBRATE ITS CENTENNIAL
DOC.TEXT: The Interfaith Peace Ministry of Orange County will conduct its annual meeting and dinner on Sunday at Chapman University in Orange . In support of the United Nations 1994 International Year of the Family , the guest speaker will be family therapist Delores Wardell discussing " Building a Family Friendly Community. " The Paul Delp Peace Award will be presented to poet and activist Mitsuye Yamada . Yamada is a board_member for Amnesty International , founder of the Multi-Cultural Women Writers and former chairperson of the Human_Rights Commission in Irvine . The meeting is from 5:30 to 8:30 p.m. in Room 209 of the Argyros building , 333 N . Glassell St . The dinner is $ 15 . For reservations , call the Interfaith Ministry at ( 714 ) 771-2901 .
